name: Anti-Pong
description:
I hate pong.

Thank you teacher for recommending this game type 🙃

This is not pong. I hate pong.

Controls:

  • Blue Player moves with W and S
  • Blue Player can move their turret with A and D
  • Blue Player shoots with Space
  • Red Player moves with up and down arrows
  • Red Player can move their turret with Left and Right arrows
  • Red Player shoots with Right Control
  • Red Player has worse controls
  • I hate pong

Last tip on how to play: Don't.
